AboutMeIntro: Hello, I am a German-speaking front-end developer from Graz. Motivated by the unlimited possibilities in IT, I look forward to designing visually appealing and intuitive websites and applications.
AboutMeLocation: Flexible in terms of working environments, I can work effectively both on-site in Dortmund and remotely.
AboutMeMindset: I am open-minded and always looking for personal challenges to constantly improve my knowledge and skills.
AboutMeProgramming: In my profession, programming isn't just about writing code; it's a creative form of problem-solving. I take pride in my ability to distill complex technical challenges into simple, user-friendly solutions. This way, I help you achieve your goals and bring your vision to life.
SkillsDescription: I have gained experience in building projects with different frontend technologies and concepts.
ContactMeDescription: Feel free to contact me, I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.
PortfolioDescription: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
PortfolioShadowAlt: Purple shadow behind the portfolio section
JoinDescription: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System.
ElPolloLocoDescription: A simple jump-and-run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe find coins and bottles to fight the big chicken.
ElPolloLocoImageAlt: Screenshot des Spiels El Pollo Loco
ContactDescription1: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
ContactDescription2: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
ContactPrivacyText2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
PersonalDataOverview: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit this website. Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified. For detailed information on the subject of data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below this text.
ResponsibleForDataCollection: Who is responsible for data collection on this website?
DataProcessingOperator: The data processing on this website is carried out by the website operator. You can find their contact details in the section 'Notice on the Responsible Party' in this privacy policy.
HowWeCollectData: How do we collect your data?
DataCollectionByUser: Your data is collected, on the one hand, by you providing it to us. This may, for example, be data that you enter into a contact form.
AutomaticDataCollection: Other data is collected automatically or after your consent when you visit the website through our IT systems. This is primarily technical data (e.g., internet browser, operating system, or time of the page access). The collection of this data occurs automatically as soon as you enter this website.
PurposeOfDataUse: What do we use your data for?
DataUsagePurpose: Part of the data is collected to ensure the error-free provision of the website. Other data may be used to analyze your user behavior.
YourRightsRegardingData: What rights do you have regarding your data?
InformationRights: You have the right to receive information free of charge at any time about the origin, recipient, and purpose of your stored personal data. You also have the right to request the correction or deletion of this data. If you have given consent to data processing, you can revoke this consent at any time for the future. You also have the right, under certain circumstances, to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data. Furthermore, you have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
DataCorrectionDeletionRights: You can contact us at any time regarding this and other questions on the subject of data protection.
ConsentRevocationRights: You have the right to revoke your consent at any time.
DataProcessingRestrictionRights: Under certain circumstances, you have the right to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data.
ComplaintRights: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority.
ContactForDataProtectionQuestions: You can contact us at any time regarding this and other questions on the subject of data protection.
AnalysisToolsTitle: Analysis Tools and Tools from Third-Party Providers
SurfingBehaviorAnalysis: When visiting this website, your surfing behavior may be statistically evaluated. This is done primarily with so-called analysis programs.
AnalysisProgramsDetails: Detailed information on these analysis programs can be found in the following privacy policy.
HostingProviderIntroduction: We host the content of our website with the following provider:
AllInklProviderDetails: The provider is ALL-INKL.COM - Neue Medien Münnich, Inh. René Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf (hereinafter referred to as All-Inkl). For details, please refer to the privacy policy of All-Inkl:
AllInklUsageBasis: The use of All-Inkl is based on Art. 6(1)(f) DSGVO. We have a legitimate interest in a reliable presentation of our website. If corresponding consent has been requested, processing is exclusively based on Art. 6(1)(a) DSGVO and § 25 Abs. 1 TTDSG (Telecommunications Telemedia Data Protection Act).
